Please take a look and share any feedback with us! OR just start contributin'!

{!header} Welcome to the latest and greatest **St Louis Game Developer RoundUp**! We have made a lot of improvements and changes since the last issue! I have tried to scrape all the latest Game Dev news relevant to our community from the web, and the goal is to always try to help raise the voices of the people out there that are struggling to be heard, but sometimes a few of the more well-known voices tend to drown out some of the others (through no fault of theirs!), so I worry about missing things... You can help by contributing anything that meets our [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/AxolStudio/STLGameDevRoundUp/blob/ce5d5bc5c141351f99431609fa3c9cbe2d0914f2/CONTRIBUTING.md) - no matter how small or seemingly unimportant! We want to know about it!
